track.name: Brass Monkey
comments: My favorite song by them... i don't know why - but it's funkeee - like Brass Monkey! <3
Put your left leg down; your right leg up.  Tilt your head back; let's finish the cup!
Ohhhh hellyeah, pass that Brass Monkey!!!
Beastie's make the best. Much love to MCA.
the fucking awesomest song! :) I love these guys so much!!!
I've been waiting for this track and they finally played it!!!! <3

Brass Monkey - that funky Monkey!
Brass Monkey - junkie!
That funky Monkey!
I offered her a sip - the girl she gave me lip It did begin the stuff wore in and now she's on my tiiiiiiiiiiiiip! I listened to this album so much as kid. RIP MCA
I've never been the biggest fan of BB's but I am growing an appreciation for them on retrospection~
Lol i grew up with this XD
